=== Propose an Event ===
To propose an event, please edit this table only - '''do not edit the above table please'''. Add your name as the "Driver", insert a test event name and a date and time for testing (please use UTC). Your event will be reviewed and added to the official list and calendar above.

=== Notes ===
* After running a test event, you need to share your findings with the members of the quality team
* To do that, you need to write an email (simple text, no formatting, no special template) and send it to the mailing list. Write about what you did and the results you achieved.
* Go to the Archive of the mailing list, find the link of your email, copy the link and paste it on '''<nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/QATeam/TestingEvents/TestingResults | Testing Results Page]]</nowiki>'''
